name: Diagnostic Report
description: System monitoring diagnostic reports sent when issues are detected in monitored applications or scripts

variables.name: subject
variables.source: Generated from monitoring script or passed in data
variables.example: Errors found on Payment Processing script

variables.name: details
variables.description: Detailed diagnostic information and error messages
variables.source: Monitoring script output or error logs
variables.example: Database connection timeout after 30 seconds\nAffected endpoints: /api/payments/process

variables.name: button
variables.description: Optional button object with label and url for action
variables.source: Passed in data dict if action is available
